Get Insper Color Palette (Internal)

Source: R/insper_palette.R
insper_pal.Rd

Internal function used by scale_*_insper_*() functions to extract palette colors. Users should use list_palettes and show_insper_palette to explore palettes, and scale functions to apply them.

Usage

insper_pal(palette = "main", n = NULL, type = "discrete", reverse = FALSE)

Arguments

palette

Character string indicating palette name

n

Number of colors to return

type

Type of palette: "discrete" or "continuous"

reverse

Logical indicating whether to reverse palette

Value

Vector of hex color codes

See also

list_palettes, show_insper_palette, scale_color_insper_d, scale_fill_insper_d

Other colors: get_insper_colors(), get_palette_colors(), list_palettes(), show_insper_colors(), show_insper_palette()

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Internal function - not exported
# Users should use scale functions instead
ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg, color = factor(cyl))) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_insper_d("main")
} # }
